name: 焦晓
introduction: Born in China, Xiao studied producing in Beijing film Academy for her first master's degree before moving to London to study directing at Goldsmiths University. She worked on several films, including #3099(London), ONE MAN'S TRASH(London), in which she had the chance to work with Ellie Haddington, NH4+ (Beijing), BLINDNESS (L.A) and so on. In 2022 Xiao also had her debut in musical theatre as the director. Xiao is a big fan of iconoclastic films. Also, she is keen on exploring fascinatingly absurd stories set in new worlds.
